zachary.shapes

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • zachary.shapes.Shape
      • zachary.shapes.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    This class represents a double precision line, that draws a line and can calculate whether it intersects with another line
    Version:
    10/22/18
    Author:
    Zachary Wang

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class zachary.shapes.Shape

        x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Line(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, int strokeWidth)
      Creates a new instance of the line object with the first drawn point having coordinates x1, y1, and the second drawn point having coordinates x2, y2 and a given line thickness
      Line(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, int strokeWidth, int[] stroke)
      Creates a new instance of the line object with the first drawn point having coordinates x1, y1, and the second drawn point having coordinates x2, y2 and given thickness and color

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
      Draws a new instance of a Line object with the first point at x1, y1 and the second point at x2, y2
      static Line generateLine(double x1, double y1, double angle, double length, int strokeWidth)
      Generates a new instance of the line object with the first drawn point having coordinates x1, y1, and the second drawn calculated point having coordinates x2, y2 from a given angle and length and given line thickness
      java.awt.geom.Point2D getCenter()
      Returns the center point of the line
      java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getPoint2()
      Returns the second point of the line
      boolean intersects(Line other)
      Determines whether this line intersects with another line
      void setPoint2(double x2, double y2)
      This takes in the point x2, y2 and sets the second point as it

    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line(double x1,
            double y1,
            double x2,
            double y2,
            int strokeWidth)
        Creates a new instance of the line object with the first drawn point having coordinates x1, y1, and the second drawn point having coordinates x2, y2 and a given line thickness
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of the first point
        y1 - y coordinate of the first point
        x2 - x coordinate of the second point
        y2 - y coordinate of the second point
        strokeWidth - thickness of the line

      • Line

        public Line(double x1,
            double y1,
            double x2,
            double y2,
            int strokeWidth,
            int[] stroke)
        Creates a new instance of the line object with the first drawn point having coordinates x1, y1, and the second drawn point having coordinates x2, y2 and given thickness and color
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of the first point
        y1 - y coordinate of the first point
        x2 - x coordinate of the second point
        y2 - y coordinate of the second point
        strokeWidth - thickness of the line
        stroke - color of the line

    • Method Detail

      • generateLine

        public static Line generateLine(double x1,
                                double y1,
                                double angle,
                                double length,
                                int strokeWidth)
        Generates a new instance of the line object with the first drawn point having coordinates x1, y1, and the second drawn calculated point having coordinates x2, y2 from a given angle and length and given line thickness
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of the first point
        y1 - y coordinate of the first point
        angle - angle of the line
        length - length of the line
        strokeWidth - thickness of the line

        y2 - y coordinate of the second point

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
        Draws a new instance of a Line object with the first point at x1, y1 and the second point at x2, y2
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        p - the reference of the PApplet used to draw the circle
        Precondition:
        p must not be null, and appropriate settings should have been selected (color, fill, etc)

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Line other)
        Determines whether this line intersects with another line
        Parameters:
        other - the reference of the other line we are testing
        Returns:
        true if the lines intersect
